description:
The girls of the Karasuma Phoniatric Clinic visit Hibiki`s family in the country. While wandering the countryside, the girls` friendship grows deeper as they learn more about Hibiki`s past and the reason they each became healers.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Blauer Himmel, grüne Berge, Flusskampf und Weltraumbahnhof
Blue Skies, Green Mountains, River Battles and the Galactic Station
Sora wa Aokute Yama wa Midori, Kawa no Tatakai Ginga Station
空は青くて山は緑, 川の戦い銀河ステーション
